content.html: Tech interview antipattern: interviewer springs a “so do you have any questions for us” to the candidate after a long coding session or when there are like 5 mins left. IMO this should be a whole separate, no-holds barred conversation, if the technical rounds went well.
content.value:
Tech interview antipattern:  interviewer springs a “so do you have any questions for us” to the candidate after a long coding session or when there are like 5 mins left.

IMO this should be a whole separate, no-holds barred conversation, if the technical rounds went well.
